channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Condor Airlines business class: Are Prime seats worth it?
item.description: Condor Airlines has a swanky business-class cabin aboard its Airbus A330-900neo, including four Prime seats that come with extra space and amenities. ...

item.title: These boutique hotels have some of the dreamiest hotel pools — and you can book them using points
item.description: We've rounded up some luxury hotels — many of which can be booked using points — that have some of the world's dreamiest hotel pools.

item.title: EU261 airline delay compensation: How to get paid when things go wrong
item.description: EU261 is a rule that provides passengers with compensation in the case of flight delays. Here's a guide of what you might be entitled to.

item.title: Who should (and shouldn’t) get the United Quest Card?
item.description: If you're on the fence about the United Quest Card, here are reasons why it does (or doesn't) make sense for you.

item.title: No longer interested in the Chase Sapphire Reserve? Consider these 5 cards instead
item.description: With the Chase Sapphire Reserve now costing $795, many travelers are rethinking their options. Compare these 5 top alternatives.
